an3.118:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipati hoti …pe… samphappalapi hoti.
an3.118:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco abhijjhalu hoti byapannacitto.
an3.118:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaditthiko hoti viparitadassano:
an3.118:4.3: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham …pe… ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
an3.118:4.5: Silavipattihetu va, bhikkhave …pe… ditthivipattihetu va, bhikkhave, satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
an3.118:4.6: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, apannako mani uddham khitto yena yeneva patitthati suppatitthitamyeva patitthati;
an3.118:4.7: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, silavipattihetu va satta …pe… upapajjanti.
an3.118:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipata pativirato hoti …pe…
an3.118:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anabhijjhalu hoti abyapannacitto.
an3.118:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaditthiko hoti aviparitadassano:
an3.118:8.3: ‘atthi dinnam, atthi yittham …pe… ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
an3.118:8.5: Silasampadahetu va, bhikkhave, satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti. Cittasampadahetu va …pe… ditthisampadahetu va, bhikkhave, satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
an3.118:8.6: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, apannako mani uddham khitto yena yeneva patitthati suppatitthitamyeva patitthati;
an3.118:8.7: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, silasampadahetu va satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti, cittasampadahetu va satta …pe… ditthisampadahetu va satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
